mapper.sql: id AS "id" , category_id AS "categoryId" , store_code AS "storeCode" , product_code AS "productCode" , product_name AS "productName" , product_key_attr_value_ids AS "productKeyAttrValueIds" , product_key_attr_value_values AS "productKeyAttrValueValues" , product_sku_attr_name_ids AS "productSkuAttrNameIds" , product_status AS "productStatus" , product_home_page AS "productHomePage" , thumbnail AS "thumbnail" , product_desc AS "productDesc" , product_memo AS "productMemo" , product_min_price AS "productMinPrice" , product_max_price AS "productMaxPrice" , on_sale_stdt AS "onSaleStdt" , on_sale_endt AS "onSaleEndt" , is_virtual AS "isVirtual" , delivery_type AS "deliveryType" , is_delivery_need_extra_data AS "isDeliveryNeedExtraData" , product_version AS "productVersion" , create_user_code AS "createUserCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_user_code AS "updateUserCode" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_user_code AS "deleteUserCode" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, category_id = #{categoryId}, store_code = #{storeCode}, product_code = #{productCode}, product_name = #{productName}, product_key_attr_value_ids = #{productKeyAttrValueIds}, product_key_attr_value_values = #{productKeyAttrValueValues}, product_sku_attr_name_ids = #{productSkuAttrNameIds}, product_status = #{productStatus}, product_home_page = #{productHomePage}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, product_desc = #{productDesc}, product_memo = #{productMemo}, product_min_price = #{productMinPrice}, product_max_price = #{productMaxPrice}, on_sale_stdt = #{onSaleStdt}, on_sale_endt = #{onSaleEndt}, is_virtual = #{isVirtual}, delivery_type = #{deliveryType}, is_delivery_need_extra_data = #{isDeliveryNeedExtraData}, product_version = #{productVersion}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_user_code = #{deleteUserCode}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_prd_product_history ( id, category_id, store_code, product_code, product_name, product_key_attr_value_ids, product_key_attr_value_values, product_sku_attr_name_ids, product_status, product_home_page, thumbnail, product_desc, product_memo, product_min_price, product_max_price, on_sale_stdt, on_sale_endt, is_virtual, delivery_type, is_delivery_need_extra_data, product_version, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{categoryId}, #{storeCode}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productKeyAttrValueIds}, #{productKeyAttrValueValues}, #{productSkuAttrNameIds}, #{productStatus}, #{productHomePage}, #{thumbnail}, #{productDesc}, #{productMemo}, #{productMinPrice}, #{productMaxPrice}, #{onSaleStdt}, #{onSaleEndt}, #{isVirtual}, #{deliveryType}, #{isDeliveryNeedExtraData}, #{productVersion}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
